org.apache.karaf.system

Interface SystemService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SystemServiceImpl

    public interface SystemService
    Describe a system service

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  SystemService.Swipe
      Types defining what to remove on a restart of Karaf

    • Method Detail

      • halt

        void halt()
   throws java.lang.Exception
        Halt the Karaf container.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the halt fails.

      • halt

        void halt(java.lang.String time)
   throws java.lang.Exception
        Halt the Karaf container.
        Parameters:
        time - Shutdown delay. The time argument can have different formats. First, it can be an absolute time in the format hh:mm, in which hh is the hour (1 or 2 digits) and mm is the minute of the hour (in two digits). Second, it can be in the format +m, in which m is the number of minutes to wait. The word now is an alias for +0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the halt fails.

      • reboot

        void reboot()
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Reboot the Karaf container.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the reboot fails.

      • reboot

        void reboot(java.lang.String time,
            SystemService.Swipe clean)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Reboot the Karaf container.
        Parameters:
        time - The reboot delay. The time argument can have different formats. First, it can be an absolute time in the format hh:mm, in which hh is the hour (1 or 2 digits) and mm is the minute of the hour (in two digits). Second, it can be in the format +m, in which m is the number of minutes to wait. The word now is an alias for +0.
        clean - Force a clean restart by deleting the working directory.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the reboot fails.

      • setStartLevel

        void setStartLevel(int startLevel)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Set the system start level.
        Parameters:
        startLevel - The new system start level.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If setting the start level fails.

      • getStartLevel

        int getStartLevel()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Get the system start level.
        Returns:
        The current system start level.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If an error occurs while retrieving the start level.

      • getFramework

        FrameworkType getFramework()
        Get the current OSGi framework in use.
        Returns:
        The FrameworkType representing the OSGi framework in use.

      • setFramework

        void setFramework(FrameworkType framework)
        Change OSGi framework to use.
        Parameters:
        framework - The new OSGi framework to use.

      • setFrameworkDebug

        void setFrameworkDebug(boolean debug)
        Enable or disable debugging.
        Parameters:
        debug - True to enable debugging, false else.

      • setSystemProperty

        java.lang.String setSystemProperty(java.lang.String key,
                                   java.lang.String value,
                                   boolean persist)
        Set a system property and persist to etc/system.properties.
        Parameters:
        key - The system property key.
        value - The system property value.
        persist - True to persist the change in Karaf etc configuration file, false else.
        Returns:
        The system property value as set.
